00001 import wx
00002 from iga.gacommon import gaParams
00003 
00004 class CollaboratePanel(wx.Panel):
00005 
00006     def __init__(self, parent, color="GRAY", name = "", orientation = wx.VERTICAL):
00007         wx.Panel.__init__(self, parent = parent)
00008 
00009         self.name = name
00010         self.orientation = orientation
00011 
00012         rows = 3
00013         cols = 2
00014         if orientation == wx.FlexGridSizer:
00015             self.sizer = wx.FlexGridSizer(rows, cols, 1, 1)
00016         else:
00017             self.sizer = wx.BoxSizer(orientation)
00018 
00019         self.SetSizer(self.sizer)
00020 
00021         self.limit = rows * cols
00022         self.best = None
00023         self.worst = None
00024         self.parent = parent
00025         self.child_panels = []
00026         self.feedback_option = ['Add to Genome', 'Unselect']
00027         self.user_feedback = set()
00028 
00029 #------------------------------------------#
00030     def clear(self):
00031         self.sizer.DeleteWindows()
00032         self.Layout()
00033 
00034 #------------------------------------------#
00035     def onFeedback(self, event_object, panel):
00036         f_option = self.feedback_option
00037         label = event_object.GetLabel()
00038 
00039         # if wanting genome
00040         if label == f_option[0]:
00041             self.user_feedback.add(self.child_panels.index(panel))
00042         else:
00043             panel.unselectAll()
00044             self.user_feedback.remove(self.child_panels.index(panel))
00045 
00046 
00047 #------------------------------------------#
00048     def clearFeedback(self):
00049         '''
00050         Clear all user selections made to
00051         individuals from other peers.
00052         '''
00053         self.user_feedback.clear()
00054         for panel in self.child_panels:
00055             panel.unselectAll()
00056 
00057 #------------------------------------------#
00058     def getPeerGenomes(self):
00059         genomes = [self.genomes[i] for i in self.user_feedback]
00060         self.clearFeedback()
00061 
00062         return genomes
00063 
00064 
00065 #------------------------------------------#
00066     def drawGenomes(self, genomes):
00067         panels = gaParams.draw(self, genomes)
00068         self.addPanels(panels)
00069         self.genomes = genomes
00070 
00071 #------------------------------------------#
00072     def addPanels(self, panels, expand = True):
00073         self.clear()
00074 
00075         self.child_panels = panels
00076         self.sizer.AddMany(panels)
00077         self.Layout()
